mapper.select: select pid, categoryId, name, price, content, createdAt, updatedAt, quantity from product where deleted = 'N' and categoryId = #{id}
select pid, categoryId, name, price, content, createdAt, updatedAt, quantity from product where deleted = 'N' and pid = #{pid}
select pid, categoryId, name, price, content, createdAt, updatedAt, quantity from product where deleted = 'N' and categoryId = #{categoryId} and name = #{productName}
mapper.update: update product set quantity = quantity + 1, updatedAt = NOW() where pid = #{pid}
mapper.insert: insert into product (categoryId, name, price, content, createdAt) values (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.update: update product set deleted = 'Y', updatedAt = NOW() where pid = #{pid}
